item.title: My Mentoring Style
item.description: Everyone has their own style of mentoring. At least that is what I believe recently, however what does mentoring really mean? You could look at dozen of articles, etimology or people's opinion regarding the meaning of mentoring. For me, mentoring is all about preparing a suitable person to embark their own journey, a greater one. In my definition there are at least several phase involved: Encounter Motivate Nurture Protect Graduate What does suitable person mean?
